Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to construction of the New York city human rights law
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Construction of the New York city human rights law.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the provision of attorney’s fees under the city human rights law
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Provision of attorney’s fees under the city human rights law

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the repeal of subdivision 16 of section 8-107 of such code relating to the applicability of provisions of the human rights law regarding sexual orientation
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Repeal of subdivision 16 of section 8-107 of such code relating to the applicability of provisions of the human rights law regarding sexual orientation.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to making improvements to clarify and strengthen the human rights law, and to repeal and replace section 8-102 of the administrative code of the city of New York, relating to definitions of terms in the human rights law, and to repeal sections 8-103, 8-104, 8-105 and 8-106 of the administrative code of the city of New York, relating to the functions, powers and duties of the commission on human rights and its relations with city departments and agencies
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Making improvements to clarify and strengthen the human rights law.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to construction of the New York city human rights law
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Construction of the New York city human rights law.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the provision of attorney’s fees under the city human rights law
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Provision of attorney’s fees under the city human rights law

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the repeal of subdivision 16 of section 8-107 of such code relating to the applicability of provisions of the human rights law regarding sexual orientation
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Repeal of subdivision 16 of section 8-107 of such code relating to the applicability of provisions of the human rights law regarding sexual orientation.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to making improvements to clarify and strengthen the human rights law, and to repeal and replace section 8-102 of the administrative code of the city of New York, relating to definitions of terms in the human rights law, and to repeal sections 8-103, 8-104, 8-105 and 8-106 of the administrative code of the city of New York, relating to the functions, powers and duties of the commission on human rights and its relations with city departments and agencies

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: Mendez and Lander
